channel.title: Dead on the Inside, But Not Outside Bug
channel.description: So I was a Noble in a Poss game who got possessed N2. Well, the Poss got jailed and exed by Prince, but he still looked alive. The same happened to the MM and Inquisitor. Although they don't look dead, people can't vote them up for trial. Here's some screenshots from the madness https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/504820136801337359/Screenshot_163.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/504820190270324746/Screenshot_164.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/504820260524785677/Screenshot_165.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/504820307714899978/Screenshot_166.png

item.title: Dead on the Inside, But Not Outside Bug
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
Even reanimated bones can walk; even the dead may live again.

item.title: Dead on the Inside, But Not Outside Bug
item.dc:creator: PoisonedSquid
item.description:
So I was a Noble in a Poss game who got possessed N2. Well, the Poss got jailed and exed by Prince, but he still looked alive. The same happened to the MM and Inquisitor. Although they don’t look dead, people can’t vote them up for trial. Here’s some screenshots from the madness
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/504820136801337359/Screenshot_163.png
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/504820190270324746/Screenshot_164.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/504820307714899978/Screenshot_166.png
